seo.title: Interactive WCAG/RGAA Quiz with Gemini and Jina
seo.description: Test your knowledge of web accessibility guidelines (WCAG/RGAA) with this dynamic quiz. This project uses Vue.js 3, Google's Gemini API for question generation, and Jina Reader for content analysis.

concept.title: AI-Powered Personalized Quiz Generator, with full transparency about its limitations
concept.intro:
This project explores RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) technology in an accessible way.
Provide a topic or URL, and the AI will automatically generate a tailored quiz.
Heads up: AI can make mistakes or 'hallucinate' - treat this as a learning tool, not gospel truth!

modal.title: How quiz generation works
modal.description: This app makes 'Retrieval-Augmented Generation' (RAG) accessible to everyone - no expertise required. Here's how it works: [Jina AI Reader](https://jina.ai/reader/) scrapes your URL and converts it into structured, AI-friendly content. [Google Gemini](https://ai.google.dev) then uses this content as its sole source of truth to craft relevant quiz questions. No URL? Gemini falls back on its general knowledge to generate questions.
